channel.title: Caleb Badura's GitHub Site
channel.description: Recent content on Caleb Badura's GitHub Site

item.title: Hot Seats for Nebraska Coaches?
item.description: Scott Frost and Fred Hoiberg have had an interesting few years as head coaches at the University of Nebraska. Frost, who just finished his fourth year as the coach of Nebraska Football, now carries a 15-29 record in his Nebraska career. On the other hand, Fred Hoiberg, now holds a 19-48 record as he has just begun his third season as the head coach of Nebraska Basketball. Not too hot.

item.title: Did COVID Affect Play on the PGA TOUR?
item.description: During the majority of the 2020 PGA TOUR season, spectators were either not allowed at all or at a very limited capacity, depending on the tournament. The presence of fans at sporting events can have a major impact on the outcomes, and that was felt heavily during many contests in 2020, as many leagues took extra precautions to limit fans and potential COVID-19 exposure. Spectators at golf tournaments can have a major part in the outcome and atmosphere of a tournament.

item.title: Text cleaning and bad college football
item.description: Installed and loaded packages. I am using football data from Sports Reference. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.5 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.4 ✓ dplyr 1.0.7 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.3 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 2.0.1 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(ggalt) ## Registered S3 methods overwritten by 'ggalt': ## method from ## grid.

item.title: About Caleb Badura
item.description: Caleb Badura is student at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln’s College of Journalism and Mass Communications who is working toward a degree in Sports Media and Communication with a minor in Business. He plans to complete his undergraduate degree in the Spring of 2023. In his three years at UNL, Caleb has been a member of the University of Nebraska-Lincoln Men’s Golf Team, and a Team Representative for the Student-Athlete Advisory Committee.
